txt.en: 'My scouts have told me that vile things have been seen in Tarlang's Crown. The water of the Blackroot itself has risen against us and serves only to strengthen the already considerable forces there.\n\n'If the water can be returned to the river, perhaps we can then mount a more successful assault on The Scourge's forces.'
Elaglar can be found in Dol Amroth.\n\nYou have defeated darkwater lurking in Tarlang's Crown and should report to Elaglar.
Tarlang's Crown - Waters of the Blackroot
'The Enemy is bold to summon our own rivers into battle against us, [placeholder]. Thank you for quieting the waters of the Blackroot once more.'
Swelling from the waters of the Blackroot, darkwaters now wander Tarlang's Crown in service of the Heirs of Castamir.

Darkwater can be found in and along the river Blackroot throughout Tarlang's Crown.\n\nElaglar has asked you to venture to Tarlang's Crown and defeat the darkwater under the thrall of the Heirs of Castamir.
